options_option_enable_report_context_men.description: If enabled CookiesOK will add an option to your context menu (right click menu) which allows you to report websites that are not (yet) handled by CookiesOK
options_option_enable_report_context_men.message: If enabled CookiesOK will add an option to your context menu (right click menu) which allows you to report websites that are not (yet) handled by CookiesOK

options_option_reporter_email_descriptio.description: Will be submitted with any websites you report if entered. You'll receive a confirmation e-mail after your report has been handled.
options_option_reporter_email_descriptio.message: Will be submitted with any websites you report if entered. You'll receive a confirmation e-mail after your report has been handled.

options_message_initial_welcome_descript.message:
Thank you for installing CookiesOK. This is the options page, you may configure some of the behaviour of CookiesOK here. Please review and adjust the options below to your liking.
If you ever need to return to this page, you can do so through the browser's extension settings.
If you enjoy using CookiesOK, please consider making a donation.
options_message_initial_welcome_descript.description:
Thank you for installing CookiesOK. This is the options page, you may configure some of the behaviour of CookiesOK here. Please review and adjust the options below to your liking.
If you ever need to return to this page, you can do so through the browser's extension settings.
If you enjoy using CookiesOK, please consider making a donation.

footer_donation_text.description: CookiesOK requires constant updating to make and keep it working for as many sites as possible. If you're using CookiesOK, please consider making a donation, helping us to further improve CookiesOK.
footer_donation_text.message: CookiesOK requires constant updating to make and keep it working for as many sites as possible. If you're using CookiesOK, please consider making a donation, helping us to further improve CookiesOK.

report_field_url_description.description: This is the address to the website where CookiesOK doesn't work (properly)..
report_field_url_description.message: This is the address to the website where CookiesOK doesn't work (properly)..

report_field_email_description.description: Not required. If entered we will send you a confirmation email when your report has been handled.
report_field_email_description.message: Not required. If entered we will send you a confirmation email when your report has been handled.

report_field_additional_notes_descriptio.description: Anything we should know when we check out your report
report_field_additional_notes_descriptio.message: Anything we should know when we check out your report

report_message_thank_you_description.description: The URL has been reported and we'll check it out shortly.
report_message_thank_you_description.message: The URL has been reported and we'll check it out shortly.
